Package org.forgerock.openidm.sync.impl

Class AbstractSyncAuditEventLogger<T extends org.forgerock.openidm.sync.impl.AbstractSyncAuditEventBuilder<T>>

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.sync.impl.AbstractSyncAuditEventLogger<T>
public abstract class AbstractSyncAuditEventLogger<T extends org.forgerock.openidm.sync.impl.AbstractSyncAuditEventBuilder<T>> extends Object
Base Template for sync related audit events.
